text:
Hi all,
I'm working on my first theme in HubSpot, following the advice of the example. I have a problem: often in the pages that I develop there is a button (with anchor link) that refers to a section (with id) of the same page, maybe further down.
Now with the development of the theme I'm trying to create this situation but I don't know which id to "hook" the link of the button and how to set a default link in the code of the html template I'm developing.
Thanks for your help
I would create a field where you could set that ID on the target module. Which you in code could give a default value <@UHA0L28CW>

Everything Erik stated.

Something we’re actually doing on the new developer website is auto-generating id’s from headings if a custom id is not set.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-local-development#2-configure-the-local-development-tools>
